name: Archer-Daniels-Midland Company
summary: Archer-Daniels-Midland Company (ADM) is a leading American multinational food processing and commodities trading corporation, founded in 1902 and headquartered in Chicago. ADM operates a global network of processing plants and procurement facilities, supplying ingredients and solutions for human and animal nutrition, and is recognized for its innovation in food, beverage, and agricultural supply chains. The company is one of the largest in its sector, ranking No. 35 on the 2023 Fortune 500 list.
